spells.html_content:
Spells

Grimace
/ Diffraction
1 - 1 Range / 3AP

Summons a biddable Grimacing Mask that locks enemies and shares its damage with its summoner as long as it is alive.
When an enemy is locked by the Mask, the mask and its summoner gain shield.

The Grimacing Mask also applies effects depending on the mask worn by its summoner:
• Intrepid: attracts entities in a 3-cell cross around it.
• Coward: increases its MP.
• Psychopath: repels adjacent entities.

When it dies, the spell's cooldown period is set to 3 turns.
If the Grimacing Mask is still alive when the spell is recast, it is teleported to the targeted cell.
Required level: :
75|142

Normal effects

Summons Grimacing Mask
120% of level to shield (2 turns)
Attracts 2 cell(s)
2 MP (infinite)
Pushes back 2 cell(s)
Fixes the cooldown period of Grimace at 3 turn(s)
Teleports to the targeted cell

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
2
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

details.name: Grimace
details.description:
Summons a biddable Grimacing Mask that locks enemies and shares its damage with its summoner as long as it is alive.
When an enemy is locked by the Mask, the mask and its summoner gain shield.

The Grimacing Mask also applies effects depending on the mask worn by its summoner:
• Intrepid: attracts entities in a 3-cell cross around it.
• Coward: increases its MP.
• Psychopath: repels adjacent entities.

When it dies, the spell's cooldown period is set to 3 turns.
If the Grimacing Mask is still alive when the spell is recast, it is teleported to the targeted cell.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Carnavalo
/ Transfiguration
1 - 3 Range / 3AP

Applies a shield on the caster, inflicts damage in the caster's best attack element on enemies, and repels the target.
The effects become stronger based on the mask worn by the caster:
• Intrepid state: shield is strongest.
• Cowardly state: pushback is strongest.
• Psychopathic state: damage is strongest.

Each mask change reduces the spell's cooldown period by one turn.
Required level: :
90|157

Normal effects

100% of level to shield (1 turn)
300% of level to shield (1 turn)
23 (Best Element damage)
33 (Best Element damage)
Pushes back 1 cell(s)
Pushes back 4 cell(s)

Critical effects

100% of level to shield (1 turn)
300% of level to shield (1 turn)
28 (Best Element damage)
38 (Best Element damage)
Pushes back 1 cell(s)
Pushes back 4 cell(s)

15%

5

No

Yes

No

Yes

spells.html_content:
Spells

Masquerade
/ Ardour
1 - 1 Range / 3AP

Inflicts Neutral damage on the caster and the target:
• The damage inflicted on the target depends on the caster's remaining health.
• The damage inflicted on the caster depends on how much health they are missing.
• The effects are inverted if the caster is below 50% health.

On the caster: switches places with their Grimacing Mask.
Required level: :
155

spells.html_content:
Spells

Transfiguration
/ Carnavalo
1 - 6 Range / 2AP

Applies the Transfiguration state on the caster and the targeted enemy, and applies effects on the enemy depending on which mask is worn:
• Intrepid state: reduces final damage inflicted.
• Cowardly state: reduces ranged resistances.
• Psychopathic state: reduces close-combat resistances.
Stacking is shared among effects.

Each mask change reduces the spell's cooldown period by one turn and reapplies the spell's effects if the caster is in the Transfiguration state.
Required level: :
200

Normal effects

'Transfiguration' state (2 turns)
Reduces final damage inflicted by 20% (1 turn)
-10% Ranged Resistance (1 turn)
-10% Melee Resistance (1 turn)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
6
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

details.name: Transfiguration
details.description:
Applies the Transfiguration state on the caster and the targeted enemy, and applies effects on the enemy depending on which mask is worn:
• Intrepid state: reduces final damage inflicted.
• Cowardly state: reduces ranged resistances.
• Psychopathic state: reduces close-combat resistances.
Stacking is shared among effects.

Each mask change reduces the spell's cooldown period by one turn and reapplies the spell's effects if the caster is in the Transfiguration state.

effects.title: Reduces final damage inflicted by 20% (1 turn)
